Class JsonWebTokenValidator

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.security.JsonWebTokenValidator
@Service public final class JsonWebTokenValidator extends Object
JSON Web Token Validator
Author:
arafkarsh

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JsonWebTokenValidator()
    Initialize the JWT with the Signature Algorithm based on Secret Key or Public / Private Key
